executionDetails: Analysis of change description prompt: Explained the purpose of asking for a user-provided change description in .github/prompts/rdd.01-initiate.prompt.md and the impact of removing it. No code changes made. Implementation details documented in P01-implementation.md.

Analysis of change description prompt: Explained the purpose of asking for a user-provided change description in .github/prompts/rdd.01-initiate.prompt.md, its usage in logs and documentation, and the impact of removing it. No code changes made. Implementation details documented in P01-implementation.md.

Completed comprehensive analysis of change description prompt usage. Key finding: description is collected but never used in current Python implementation or legacy bash version. Provided detailed analysis with code evidence, impact assessment, and recommendations in P01-implementation.md.

Removed description question from change creation workflow (route_change function) as it was never used. Enhanced interactive menu (_curses_menu function) with Unicode box drawing, better layout, centered text, improved help text, and enhanced selection indicators for professional appearance.
